Items.Title: Oversight - Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Governor & MTA to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown.

Items.Title: Oversight - Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Governor & MTA to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Johnson, Espinal and Deutsch
